audio_file: Relay the message Jovanie Angana Precious Real 616279334000 030225.wav

transcription.text: Yes po hello good morning Good morning po
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Si ma'am Precious na po ito ma'am
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Si ma'am Precious na po ito Speaking na po Miss Precious
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi po, sir. San po niya to. Nga po kasi yung tita niya, naiwan niya tong cellphone.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay so ma'am by the way good morning po Si Giovanni Angana po ito ma'am from Credit Max And I'm calling po in behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line So regarding itong tawag ko sa Maya Bank po sana ni Miss Precious and napanchekin po dito Natawagan itong number nito Nung February 28 Nasabihan niyo po ba siya ma'am Na tumatawag kami regarding po sa Maya Bank niya sa number na ito
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: May message po namin, may message po nung tita niya sa through messenger po, sir.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay po so regarding dito ma'am Baka by any means meron kayong explanation Time dyan ngayon or mamaya Pasuyo naman ma'am magiging suyo kami pa-inform naman po Ako kay Miss Precious kasi until na po kasi Wala po kaming nare-receive na any Coordination po galing sa kanya Regarding nga dito sa Maya Bank po niya
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay Pasuyo ako ma'am para na din po na hindi kayong Matawag-tawagan na po ulit-ulit dito kasi Kayo po yung patuloy na makakareceive ng tawag dito ma'am Pag hindi po siya nakikipag-coordinate Since indicated nga po ito sa Personal contact nya yung number ninyo
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay thank you so much ma'am maraming salamat po Magandang umaga po ma'am ingat po kayo palagi
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ako po, sir. Thank you po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

translation.tagalog: Yes po hello good morning Good morning po
translation.english: Yes, hello, good morning. Good morning.

translation.tagalog: Si ma'am Precious na po ito ma'am
Si ma'am Precious na po ito Speaking na po Miss Precious
translation.english: Is this Ma'am Precious? Speaking, Miss Precious.

translation.tagalog: Hindi po, sir. San po niya to. Nga po kasi yung tita niya, naiwan niya tong cellphone.
translation.english: No, sir. This is her aunt’s. She left this cellphone behind.

translation.tagalog: Okay so ma'am by the way good morning po Si Giovanni Angana po ito ma'am from Credit Max And I'm calling po in behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line So regarding itong tawag ko sa Maya Bank po sana ni Miss Precious and napanchekin po dito Natawagan itong number nito Nung February 28 Nasabihan niyo po ba siya ma'am Na tumatawag kami regarding po sa Maya Bank niya sa number na ito
translation.english: Okay ma'am, by the way good morning. This is Giovanni Angana from Credit Max, and I'm calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. This call is regarding Miss Precious’s Maya Bank. We tried calling this number on February 28. Were you able to inform her, ma'am, that we’ve been calling about her Maya Bank on this number?

translation.tagalog: May message po namin, may message po nung tita niya sa through messenger po, sir.
translation.english: Her aunt sent her a message through Messenger, sir.

translation.tagalog: Okay po so regarding dito ma'am Baka by any means meron kayong explanation Time dyan ngayon or mamaya Pasuyo naman ma'am magiging suyo kami pa-inform naman po Ako kay Miss Precious kasi until na po kasi Wala po kaming nare-receive na any Coordination po galing sa kanya Regarding nga dito sa Maya Bank po niya
translation.english: Okay ma'am, so regarding this, if by any chance you have time now or later, please inform Miss Precious. We haven't received any coordination from her yet regarding her Maya Bank.

translation.tagalog: Okay Pasuyo ako ma'am para na din po na hindi kayong Matawag-tawagan na po ulit-ulit dito kasi Kayo po yung patuloy na makakareceive ng tawag dito ma'am Pag hindi po siya nakikipag-coordinate Since indicated nga po ito sa Personal contact nya yung number ninyo
translation.english: Okay, ma'am, please inform her so that you won't keep getting repeat calls since you’ll continue to receive the calls if she doesn’t coordinate. Your number is listed as her personal contact.

translation.tagalog: Okay thank you so much ma'am maraming salamat po Magandang umaga po ma'am ingat po kayo palagi
translation.english: Okay, thank you so much, ma'am. Have a good morning and take care always.

translation.tagalog: Ako po, sir. Thank you po.
